# PHLivePhotoViewPlaybackStyle

**Enumeration**

Options for how much of the motion and sound content of a Live Photo to play, used in the [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotosUI/PHLivePhotoView/startPlayback(with:)] method and in messages to the view’s [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotosUI/PHLivePhotoView/delegate] object.

## Declaration

```swift
enum PHLivePhotoViewPlaybackStyle
```

## Constants

- **PHLivePhotoViewPlaybackStyle.undefined**: This value is invalid for use.
- **PHLivePhotoViewPlaybackStyle.full**: Plays back the entire motion and sound content of the Live Photo, including transition effects at the start and end.
- **PHLivePhotoViewPlaybackStyle.hint**: Plays back only a brief section of the motion content of the Live Photo, without sound.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Constants

- **PHLivePhotoBadgeOptions**: Options for the semantic use and display style of icons for badging Live Photo assets, used by the [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotosUI/PHLivePhotoView/livePhotoBadgeImage(options:)] method.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
